alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:44AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sedgwick, southern Harvey and Butler Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 442 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colwich to Andover to 6 miles west of Latham. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, El Dorado, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Douglass, Sedgwick, Towanda, Colwich, Benton, Mount Hope, Whitewater and Leon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 25. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 37 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
